item.title: Those Falling Crime Rates Have One Big Catch
item.description: Crime is down, but so are arrests.

item.title: Apex Trump
item.description: Donald Trump’s power arrives before the presidency.

item.title: Houston’s Bayou Bend: The Origin Story of Texan High Culture
item.description: The visionary Ima Hogg bought the best old American furniture, silver, ceramics, and textiles to inspire good taste in design.

item.title: Garland’s Cynical Rescission of the Death Penalty Protocol
item.description: The outgoing Biden-Harris administration and its AG continue to play a political game with capital punishment.

item.title: MAGA’s Messy California Critique
item.description: Botching the small details only gives critics license to revel in their sense of superiority, even when the big-picture allegations are correct.
